entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:38 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
